MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH65 postcode area of Whitby, affecting properties in Bedford Avenue and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.30am due to safety after locating a fault on the underground cable and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.07am on 31st of December 2020.
